title: Our neighbour: Australia
creator_credit: Agha Bashir Ahmad, Rashid Khan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A general survey of Australia, its resources and its work under the Colombo Plan, as seen through the eyes of a student from South-East Asia. This film is the work of two Pakistan students, who came to Australia under the Colombo Plan to study the profession of film-making at the studios of the Films Division of the Department of the Interior.
